scripts.__comment1: NOTE! Using set to set environment variables does not work (they are process specific).
scripts.start-dev: start /b npm run run-app && npm run compile-typescript-watch
scripts.start-test: start /b npm run run-app && npm run compile-typescript-watch
scripts.set-env-development: setx FLASK_APP run.app && setx FLASK_ENV development
scripts.set-env-testing: setx FLASK_APP run.app && setx FLASK_ENV testing
scripts.set-env-production: setx FLASK_APP run.app && setx FLASK_ENV production
